mapper.update:
update venue_infrastructure
venue_id = #{venueId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
infrastructrue_id = #{infrastructrueId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update venue_infrastructure set venue_id = #{venueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, infrastructrue_id = #{infrastructrueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select v.venue_id as venueId,i.id as infrastructureId,i.infrastructure_name as infrastructureName,i.logo as logo from venue_infrastructure v INNER JOIN infrastructure i on v.infrastructrue_id = i.id where v.venue_id = #{venueId}
